attributes.review: First off when I Open the app I saw a ugly orange Cheeto trying to lift a water bottle which was disgusting and when I want to go see more about the app I saw him naked 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮so don’t buy the app

attributes.review: when i was on the app, it was very slow and kept glitching. it kept glitching so much that i felt my phone moving around in my pocket, i thought it was going to explode 😳😳 i also did not enjoy looking at the ugly, racist, homophobic, orange, big, scary, transphopic, hypocrite, rapist on my screen. pls take this app down to save the rest of the people! xoxo, someone who cares❤️

attributes.review: I heard that China actually made this app, so it was a no for me. I can’t have communist China taking my information. The rest of you, beware!! Download at your own risk. Trump 2020
